item.description:
Meet up with Mark for a discussion on Holistic Health, Transcendental Healing, and Breath Work. Mark has a Healing office in Brighton, on Tremont Street, and is a member of several health and healing meet up groups throughout the Boston area. Mark is an assistant organizer for our group.


Hi Everyone,

My office is located in Brighton, MA
Address is 121B Tremont Street, Suite 19

Directions for drivers:

From Boston take Mass Pike West to Exit 17 After an exit go straight past Crowne Plaza Hotel bearing to the left and reversing directions. At the second set of lights take a right, (there is a sign pointing direction to Brighton.) Then take first leftâ€¦ That is Tremont street. My building is about 3/4 of the miles away on the left.

From West of Boston Mass Pike East to Exit 17 at the second set of lights take a right, (there is a sign pointing direction to Brighton). Then take first left, that is Tremont Street. My building is about 3/4 of the miles away on the left.

From North or South of Boston Take I-93 to exit 20, then Mass Pike West to Exit 17. After exit, go straight past Crowne Plaza Hotel, bearing to the left and reversing directions. At the second set of lights take a right, (there is a sign pointing direction to Brighton). Then take first left that is Tremont Street. My building, (121B) is about 3/4 of a mile away on the left.

Directions for T riders:

From Kenmore Station (Green Line) Take bus 57 which stops at my building.121B Tremont St. Suite 19 is in the entrance to the left on the first floor, down the first hallway to the right.

Mark Levin
item.how_to_find_us: Suite 19 is in the entrance to the left on the first floor, down the first hallway to the right.
